name: wingdev web
notes: Static site with no backend or third-party service integrations detected. Uses a CNAME file suggesting custom domain hosting (likely GitHub Pages). The liquid-ether.js file is a bundled Three.js WebGL animation used as a visual effect on the site.

services.name: GitHub Pages
services.notes: Inferred from the presence of a CNAME file in the project root, which is the standard mechanism for configuring a custom domain on GitHub Pages.

description: A static marketing/landing site for the Wingdev project, featuring a Three.js-powered liquid ether WebGL animation as a visual effect.

maintenance.notes: Three.js releases frequently with breaking changes. Review changelog before upgrading.
maintenance.title: Keep Three.js dependency up to date

maintenance.notes: After editing src/liquid-ether.js, re-run esbuild to update the root liquid-ether.js file that is loaded by index.html.
maintenance.title: Rebuild liquid-ether.js bundle after source changes

quick_start.label: Build bundle
quick_start.notes: Compiles the Three.js animation into the root liquid-ether.js

future_features.title: Add buttons for downloads
future_features.description: Investigate sideloading or whatever itâ€™s called when you install off App Store
future_features.label: roadmap
